com.fxgraph.cells

Class TriangleCell

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fxgraph.cells.AbstractCell
      • com.fxgraph.cells.TriangleCell
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICell, IGraphNode

    public class TriangleCell
extends AbstractCell
    A resizable cell represented by a red triangle, of size 50.
    Author:
    sirolf2009, ogallagher (javadoc)

      javafx.scene.layout.Region getGraphic(Graph graph)

    • Method Detail

      • getGraphic

        public javafx.scene.layout.Region getGraphic(Graph graph)
        Create the resizable isosceles red triangle graphic to represent this cell, and enable resizing handles.
        Parameters:
        graph - The graph that this node is a member of.
        Returns:
        The fx node used to display the graph node.
        See Also:
        CellGestures.makeResizable(Graph, Region)
